title: Total international travellers entering the country in Canada 2019
summary: A line chart of the number of travellers entering Canada .
It starts out high then plummets , and maintains the low level .
gold: The graph is displaying the number of total international travellers entering the country in Canada over 12 months of the year 2019 . The vertical axis represent number of persons entering in millions of people , while the horizontal axis corresponds to consecutive months . It is clear that the highest peak was recorded over the summer months , peaking in August .
